translations: 威吓；虚张声势；神气十足地走
恃强凌弱者；自吹自擂者

sentences.sentence: ZK: the other question is for such a big piece of land of 40 hectors, it never seems to me make sense to use all the land to build three to five cultural facilities, no matter how big they are.
sentences.translation: 张轲：另外一个问题是，对于这样将近四十公顷的大片土地来说，使用全部土地来建设三到五座文化设施，不论其规模大小似乎都不太有道理。
